name: v5.4.3
body: Fixes #373, where setContentText would not update the showcaseview

name: v5.4.2
body: Fixes #377 - showcase jitters when resetting the showcase position

name: v5.4.1
body: Fixes #369 - an issue relating to TextPaints

**changed behaviour**
- ShowcaseView now inserts into the content view by default. To use the old behaviour, see [`ShowcaseView.Builder#useDecorViewAsParent()`](https://github.com/amlcurran/ShowcaseView/blob/master/library/src/main/java/com/github/amlcurran/showcaseview/ShowcaseView.java#L625)

**demo changes**
- Updates support libraries
- Adds demo for toolbar items
- Adds target for toolbar items

#### changes
- #304 - adds showcaseview to custom parent

#### breaking changes
- temporarily bumps minSdk to 11, awaiting #310
Adds method to block all touches

- Adds a method of replacing the button ([example](https://github.com/amlcurran/ShowcaseView/blob/master/sample/src/main/java/com/github/amlcurran/showcaseview/sample/SampleActivity.java#L79))

Available on Maven as `com.github.amlcurran.showcaseview:library:5.2.1`

- New API to enable custom text drawing ([example](https://github.com/amlcurran/ShowcaseView/blob/master/sample/src/main/java/com/github/amlcurran/showcaseview/sample/CustomTextActivity.java#L19))
- New API to enable custom showcases ([example](https://github.com/amlcurran/ShowcaseView/blob/master/sample/src/main/java/com/github/amlcurran/showcaseview/sample/CustomShowcaseActivity.java#L32))
- Update for a new Material style showcase

Available on Maven using `com.github.amlcurran.showcaseview:library:5.2.0`

name: 5.1.1-SNAPSHOT 1
body: This version upgrades the build tools to use the recommended release versions.

name: v5.0.0
body:
What's new:
- Massive improved API, using a Builder pattern.
- Gradle support, with Maven repository (`com.github.amlcurran.showcaseview:library:5.0.0`)
- Move back to hardware acceleration

N.B 
Some APIs have been removed whilst they get rebuilt:
- ShowcaseViews
- Scale viewing
  Please use the `legacy` branch if you'd like these features.

Happy Showcasing!

With this release comes lots of new goodies:
- New [Target API](https://github.com/Espiandev/ShowcaseView/wiki/Target-API)
- ActionBarCompat support
- Tests
- New animation abilities
- Better test positioning
- Better reflection
- Easier to get started with the library
- Better documentation and samples
- Host of bug fixes and other less exciting things

name: v3.5.0
body:
- NEW! Easily theme the entire ShowcaseView, using TextAppearances for the text styling
- NEW! The showcase colour can now be customised too
- Removed detailed- and titleTextColor attributes
- Add test directory - not yet used, but hopefully soon will me
